text: Nagra antahi'noe, Sata'ma kini tra anteno mani'nea kumate mani'nenka, Nagri nagima azeri hanavemati'nanana, Sata'ma mani'nere'ma mani'nankeno, Nagri naneke huama nehia ne'ma, Antipasina tamagri amu'nompinti avare'za ahe'naze. Ana hazanagi tamagra Nagrite'ma tamamentintima hu'naza zana otretfa hu'naze.
